about.description: Relief and care for headache and fever

uses.treat_1: Treat infections of the ear, nose, and throat.
uses.treat_2: Treat Infections of the genitourinary tract.
uses.treat_3: Infections of the skin and skin structure.
uses.treat_4: Infections of the lower respiratory tract.

safety_tips.warning_1: Do not use this medication if you are allergic to amoxicillin or to any other penicillin antibiotic.
safety_tips.warning_2: Amoxicillin can make birth control pills less effective.

about.description: An antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms.

uses.treat_1: Treat cold or allergy symptoms such as sneezing, itching, watery eyes, or
uses.treat_3: Treat reactions to insect bites and stings.

safety_tips.warning_1: Cetirizine can cause side effects that may impair your thinking or reactions.
safety_tips.warning_2: Avoid drinking alcoholic beverages while taking this medication.
safety_tips.warning_3: Tell your doctor if you have or have ever had kidney or liver disease.

about.description: Ambroxol is kind of strong expectorant, clinically proven active mucolytic agent

uses.treat_1: It is used to relieve chronic inflammatory pulmonary conditions.
uses.treat_2: It is used to treat bronchiectasis, bronchitis with bronchospasm asthma.
uses.treat_3: The medicine has local anesthetic properties which contribute to the soothing effect of the syrup.
uses.treat_4: Treatment of respiratory diseases associated with viscid or excessive mucus.
uses.treat_5: Ambroxol in this case relieves the patient from an excessive cough and thick sputum.

safety_tips.warning_1: Avoid using the medicine during the first trimester of pregnancy
safety_tips.warning_2: Avoid drinking alcoholic beverages while taking this medication.
safety_tips.warning_3: Don't take if you have asthma or asthma attacks

about.description: For relief of cold and all its symptoms.

uses.treat_1: It is used to relieve relief of clogged nose.
uses.treat_2: It is used to treat body aches.
uses.treat_3: Fever associated with the common cold
uses.treat_5: A allergic rhinitis, sinusitis, and flu.

safety_tips.warning_1: This medicine should not be used in people who are taking antidepressant drugs.
safety_tips.warning_2: Neozep should not be used in people who are allergic to certain drugs, especially the components contained in this medicine.

about.description: Used to treat a wide variety of bacterial infectionsd

safety_tips.warning_1: Do not take this drug again if you’ve ever had an allergic reaction to it before.
safety_tips.warning_2: Cephalexin can cause a severe allergic reaction.
